channel.title: Image change/reload
channel.description:
On the updated index page, there is the reload button that changes the image. What it actually does it reloads the whole page.
Could you change it so it uses javascript/ajax so it loads new content or images inline instead of refreshing the whole page. I know it's not a big deal, but having it do that seems very amateur.
